sect2.title: Essential Kit (V3) a true cross-platform tool for Unity which provides unique and unified way to access native functionality on mobile platforms.

blockquote.para: Supports mobile platforms iOS 15+ (till iOS 17) | Android 21+
As promised, all customers get Ads Kit for Free - No Code Required!

sect3.para: Unity Forum Thread | Tutorials | API Reference | Support
â€¢ Unified API design | Never write code per platform
â€¢ Easy installation
â€¢ No knowledge of native platform services is required
â€¢ Simulate most feature behavior in the Editor
â€¢ Generate Android manifest and permissions as per feature usage
â€¢ Automatically adds required capabilities on iOS
â€¢ Only select features you need
â€¢ Complete ASMDEF
â€¢ Full source code is included
â€¢ Detailed tutorials with native platform setup
â€¢ Unity cloud build and batch mode compatible
â€¢ Actively supported since 2015
â€¢ Address Book - Access contacts of the user
â€¢ App Updater - Prompt version updates to user
â€¢ Billing Services - Privacy First In-App purchases (Consumables/Non-Consumables/**Subscriptions**)
â€¢ Cloud Services - Save data in the cloud (iCloud & Saved Games)
â€¢ Deep Link Services - Connect your content/screen with a url
â€¢ Game Services - Leaderboards, Achievements done right
â€¢ Mail Sharing - Share data through mail
â€¢ Message Sharing - Share data as messages
â€¢ Media Services - Select, Capture, Save media content (Gallery/Camera)
â€¢ Native UI - Popups (Alert Dialog, Date/Time Picker (New!) - Native alerts
â€¢ Network Connectivity - Check network connection
â€¢ Local Notifications - Schedule time or calender notifications
â€¢ Remote/Push Notifications - Receive remote notifications
â€¢ Rate My App - Get ratings
â€¢ Social Sharing - Share to social media (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp)
â€¢ Share Sheet - Share images, videos, urls etc
â€¢ Web View- Access browser within Unity
â€¢ Plugin doesn't include Facebook SDK.
â€¢ Works with Unity Cloud Build.
â€¢ You need to add "com.unity.nuget.**newtonsoft**\-json": "2.0.0" in Packages/manifest.json
